SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwDASheogorathStatueScript

float timer
short speech

begin OnActivate

	if GetStage fbmwDASheogorath < 10
		set speech to 1
	elseif GetStage fbmwDASheogorath == 60
		if player.GetItemCount 0forkuhorripilationuunique >= 1
			set speech to 4
		endif
	endif
end

begin GameMode

	if GetStage fbmwDASheogorath == 70
		return
	endif

	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )

	if timer <= 0
		if GetStage fbmwDASheogorath < 10
			if speech == 1
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDASheogorathStatueRef.Say mwDASheogorathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 2
			elseif speech == 2
				set timer to mwDASheogorathStatueRef.Say mwDASheogorathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 3
			elseif speech == 3
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdasheogorath 10
				AddTopic 1forksofshorripilation
				AddTopic 1giantsbullsnetch
				AddTopic 1madshermit
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDASheogorath == 60
			if speech == 4
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDASheogorathStatueRef.Say mwDASheogorathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 5
			elseif speech == 5
				set timer to mwDASheogorathStatueRef.Say mwDASheogorathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 6
			elseif speech == 6
				EnablePlayerControls
				player.RemoveItem 0forkuhorripilationuunique 1 
				player.AddItem 0spearumercyuunique 1
				SetStage fbmwdasheogorath 70
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 922 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
